summary: This is a Victim Notification System (VNS) email from the U.S. Department of Justice, Southern District of New York, notifying identified victims or potential victims about upcoming court hearings in the case against Jeffrey Epstein. It schedules three hearings before Judge Richard Berman in 2019 and 2020.

keyFacts: The document is a formal victim notification for case 19-CR-00490, United States v. Jeffrey Epstein.
It identifies the recipient as a victim or potential victim identified by law enforcement during the investigation.
Three future court hearings are scheduled: oral arguments on October 28, 2019 and March 12, 2020, and a status conference on June 8, 2020.
All hearings are to be held before Judge Richard Berman in the Southern District of New York.
The notification provides instructions for victims to access the Victim Notification System (VNS) for updates.
